MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Scholar Green, affecting properties in Mill Lane, Birch Tree Lane, Drumber Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:30AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:16AM on 26th April 2021.
